quizDescription: Test your knowledge of intermediate-level keyboard shortcuts for computer efficiency.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is used to switch between open applications or windows?
questions.explanation: Alt + Tab allows you to cycle through open applications.

questions.question: Which keyboard shortcut is used to open the Task Manager in Windows?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + Shift + Esc opens the Task Manager directly.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is used to take a screenshot of the entire screen in Windows?
questions.explanation: PrtScn captures a screenshot of the entire screen to the clipboard.

questions.question: Which keyboard shortcut is used to open a new incognito/private window in web browsers?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + Shift + N is the shortcut for opening an incognito/private window.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is used to save a document or file in most applications?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + S is the standard shortcut for saving a document or file.
